subject: Mac OS X failing test in demo
msgSnippet: I ve looked in archives and FAQ but haven t seen anything on this. I recently installed junit3.8.1 on MacOS 10.3.8 with the latest java available. When I run
messageBody:
I've looked in archives and FAQ but haven't seen anything on this.

I recently installed junit3.8.1 on MacOS 10.3.8 with the latest java
available.

When I run
java junit.swingui.TestRunner junit.samples.AllTests

it runs fine, but one Framework test fails:
...
junit.tests.runner.TextRunnerTest
testSuccess

The trace is (Why can't I copy & paste from that window?)
junit.framework.AssertionFailedError
at junit.tests.runner.TextRunnerTest.execTest(TextRunnerTest.java:37)
at junit.tests.runnre.TextRunnerTestSuccess(TextRunnerTest.java:20)
at sun.reflect.NativeMethodAccessorImpl.invoke0(Native Method)
at
sun.reflect.NativeMethodAccessorImpl.invoke(NativeMethodAccessorImpl.jav
a:39)
at
sun.reflect.DelegatingMethodAccessroImpl.invoke(DelegatingMethodAccessor
Impl.java:25)


What's up with that?
What should I do about it?

Thanks.

joe
